Hello World¶

Script.load_data(fileName)¶

Function to load a .dmh File

Parameter:fileName (str.) – Path and name of file
Rückgabe:none – saving data in global lists list_vert and list_face
Script.make_obj(smooth, data)¶

Function create a new object by using parameters and global lists list_vert and list_face

Parameter:smooth – Option to use smooth shading
Rückgabe:none
Script.save_data(fileName)¶

Function to save a .dmh File

Parameter:fileName (str.) – Path and name of file
Rückgabe:none – saving global lists list_vert and list_face to file in json format
